thread.title: Q4 Alpha Fortress ==to==>> Quake4 1.3 ==>> Sentry Gun

post.author: edinal
post.body:
Hello!

Me interests that. In Q4F Alpha Fortress there is a function. At the Engineer. It(he) is able to build machines.
Whether probably to transfer her(it) in Quake4 1.3???

Screenshots from menu and machine Sentry Gun:




Help me! Please!!! Very much I want to play Quake4 1.3 with Machines!!!


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Well! I spread for all coders files SDK (SourceCode).


SDK for Quake4 Fortress

SDK for Quake4


And I very much hope, that they will help you! What to help me!!

All thanks for understanding and assistance!!!


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

post.author: simulation
post.body:
edinal wrote:
Hello!

Me interests that. In Q4F Alpha Fortress there is a function. At the Engineer. It(he) is able to build machines.
Whether probably to transfer her(it) in Quake4 1.3???

Screenshots from menu and machine Sentry Gun:




Help me! Please!!! Very much I want to play Quake4 1.3 with Machines!!!

I hadn't thought to ask before, but why all the effort porting stuff to Q4 1.3? Why not use 1.4.2?

post.author: edinal
post.body: In 1.3 there is this mod. But it is necessary to me with mod Fortress in Quake4 1.3. Without any nonsense with Fortress

post.author: edinal
post.body:
I have SousceCode Q4Fortress and Q4 v.1.3. All is perfectly compiled. But it is necessary to transfer .SentryGun. In Quake4 v.1.3
But how
And where what function is responsible that for that
